full_summary:
**Competition # W2282-24-AA018: Statistical Analyst Position**
================================================>);
### Contract Overview

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites qualified vendors to participate in a competition for the provision of statistical analysis services to support the Director of Research Operational and Organizational Dynamics (DROOD).

### Services Required

The successful bids shall provide an Intermediate Statistical Analyst with expertise in methodology and analysis (UNSPSC code: 81131500) to support the analysis and reporting of "Your Say Matters" (YSM): Defence Team Well-Being Survey.

### Competition Schedule

*   **Tender Closing Date:** June 24, 2024, at 14:00:00
*   **Publication Date:** June 7, 2024

### Notice Type and Status

This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) under the competitive procurement method. The current status of this tender is Expired.

### Contract Value and Period

The contract value and period have yet to be determined.

### Selection Criteria

The successful bidder will be selected based on a competitive evaluation of the proposal, considering the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

### Canadian Trade Agreements

The following trade agreements are applicable to this procurement:

*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CACFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contact Information

Queries and concerns should be directed to:

*   Olga Zelenskaia
*   Department of National Defence Commitment Procurement Management Section (CMPS)
*   [CMPSolicitations-SollicitationsduCPM@forces.gc.ca](mailto:CMPSolicitations-SollicitationsduCPM@forces.gc.ca)
*   (343) 596-4827

### Address

The vendor is advised to mail all proposals to the following address:

*   Department of National Defence
*   60 Moodie Drive
*   Ottawa, Ontario K2H 8G1

### Documents and Support Materials
